original:
Description: 
In the turmoil of Europe, the Holy Father declares that all those who go to liberate the Holy Land will be freed of their sins. Islam, with several large kingdoms and empires, is under attack by the fractious Catholic realms. One must rise up to defend their faith. 

§YThe Sword of Islam§! adds playable Muslim rulers to the game, and with them comes new unique gameplay. Balance Greed versus Nobility with the Dynasty Decadence System. Islam is traditionally a religion of modesty, Decadence can cause your dynasty to collapse from within if you engage in immoral behavior. With a different culture enabling polygamy, one can have up to four wives for Muslim rulers. 

"The Ummah is under attack. All true Muslims must be charitable in peace and relentless in Jihad. Let the Sword of Islam fall upon the infidels that threaten our lands, our faith!"
translation:
描述：
在欧洲的动荡中，圣父教宗宣布所有去解放圣地的人都将被赦免罪孽。伊斯兰教的几个较大的王国和帝国正在受到难以抵挡的天主教国家的进攻。每个人必须奋起捍卫自己的信仰。

§Y「伊斯兰之剑」§!将可扮演的穆斯林统治者加入到游戏之中，并且带来了全新的独特玩法。家族腐化系统要求统治者在贪婪与崇高之间找到平衡点。伊斯兰教传统上是一个谦逊的宗教，如果你做出了不道德的行为，那么腐化会导致你的家族从内部崩溃。穆斯林的不同文化使得一夫多妻制成为可能，穆斯林统治者最多可拥有四位妻子。

「乌玛正在受到攻击。所有真正的穆斯林必须在和平中保持仁慈，在吉哈德中不屈不挠。让伊斯兰之剑制裁威胁我们国土的异教徒，为了我们的信仰！」

original:
Description: 
The Legacy of Rome expansion focuses on the rich political world of Byzantine Empire. The vassals have been scheming, they have split into factions, and they are banding together to revolt against your rule. This expansion contains a wealth of new features to outsmart them and maintain your empire. 

New sets of decisions and events specifically designed with the Byzantine Empire in mind, like being able to blind and castrate your prisoners.

Orthodox rulers can Mend the Schism, reuniting the Western and Eastern halves of the church and rendering Roman Catholicism a heresy. You also get a new army type, Retinues. The difference from feudal levies, those of the Byzantines never need to be disbanded.

The final breaths of the Roman Empire are in your hands!
translation:
描述：
「罗马遗产」扩展包聚焦于拜占庭帝国丰富的政治世界。诸侯们暗中谋划着，他们组成一个个派系，联合起来反抗你的统治。这个扩展包包含了丰富的新特性，用计谋打败他们，维护你的帝国。

一系列为拜占庭帝国特别设计的新决议和事件，例如你能够致盲和阉割囚犯。

东正教统治者可以修复大分裂，重新整合东西方教会，使罗马天主教成为异端邪说。你也会得到一种全新的军队类型，近卫军。与封建征召军不同，那些拜占庭人永远不需要被解散。

罗马帝国的命运掌握在你的手中！

original:
Description: 
It is the late 13th century and Europe is still reeling from the all-conquering Mongol Hordes. Just as the Lords of the West breathe a sigh of relief, another threat looms on the horizon. Strange ships bearing winged serpents and grinning skulls, symbols never before seen in the known world, have been sighted all along the Atlantic coast. 

As the sun sets on the shores of Morocco, Portugal and Ireland, the largest fleet that has ever set sail approaches land, ready to invade in the name of bloodthirsty gods.

This fantasy scenario marks Paradox Development Studios first departure from history. Hearing of Europe from traveling Northmen, the blood drenched Aztec Civilization has risen early and now spread like a virulent plague. Prepare to defend all you hold dear against the Sunset Invasion!
translation:
描述：
十三世纪末期，整个欧洲大陆仍然遭受着所向披靡的蒙古族部落的侵略。正当西方世界有一丝喘息机会的时候，又一个巨大的威胁正在悄悄临近。以毒蛇巨蟒和骷髅作为装饰的陌生船只出现在海面上，上面的标志从未为世人所见。

当夕阳沉入摩洛哥，葡萄牙与爱尔兰的海平面时，有史以来最大的舰队正逐步地接近陆地，准备以嗜血之神的名义入侵。

这种幻想场景标志着Paradox开发工作室首次脱离历史。嗜血的阿兹特克文明从北方人口中得知了欧洲大陆，便像瘟疫一样传播开来，四处侵攻。做好准备去面对「日落入侵」，守护你所珍重的一切！

original:
Description: 
In The Republic you play as a Patrician in one of the great medieval Merchant Republics. Control the sea lanes and the coasts of Europe, survive feuds with other Patrician families and plot to seize Trade Posts from your rivals. Expand your trade empire as you compete with the other families for the coveted position of Doge and the leadership of the Republic. 

Experience a new and different type of game by playing as one of the great Merchant Republics: Venice, Genoa, Pisa, the Hanseatic League, or Gotland. Guide your dynasty to fortune in a world dominated by kings and emperors. 

Your Trade Posts are your source of income. Construct them in coastal provinces of yours and others. However, ensure you have good diplomatic relations with those countries lest they, or a rival merchant republic, tries to seize your money.
translation:
描述：
在「共和国」扩展包中，你将在一个伟大的中世纪商业共和国中扮演一位贵人。控制航道和欧洲海岸，与其他贵人家族一同存续下去，并去谋夺敌对的贸易站。在与其他觊觎共和国总督和领袖地位的贵人家族角逐的同时扩张你的贸易帝国。

作为伟大的商业共和国之一来体验一种全新而另类的游戏类型：威尼斯，热那亚，比萨，汉萨同盟和哥特兰。在帝王所统治的世界去引导你的家族赢得财富。

你的贸易站是你的收入来源。去把它们建设在你与其他国家的沿海省份之上。但是，请确保你与那些国家维持良好的关系，以免他们或者敌对的商业共和国夺取你的金钱。

original:
Description: 
The year is 867 AD. The Viking Rurik has founded the kingdom of Rus and the Great Heathen Army under the sons of Ragnar Lodbrok rampage through England. As a Pagan chieftain you survive by ravaging your weak neighbors. If you remain at peace for too long, your people will grow restless - Fortune favors the bold! 

Play as a Pagan or Zoroastrian ruler, with particular focus on the dreaded Vikings. Christians and Muslims can dispatch missions to convert heathens to stop the raids on their land. Pagans may fight back in the name of the old gods, and even seek to eliminate the monotheists from Europe. Alternatively, pagan religions can adopt elements of the Abrahamic faiths to change themselves into something new - a reformed faith with their own religious head and holy scripture. 

Pillage and adventure according to true Viking tradition!
translation:
描述：
现在是公元 867 年。维京人留里克建立了罗斯王国，朗纳尔·洛德布罗克之子领导下的异教徒大军在英格兰横冲直撞。作为原始宗教酋长，你以劫掠你的邻居为生。如果你长期保持和平，你的人民将躁动不安——幸运眷顾大胆的人！

扮演原始宗教或祆教统治者的同时聚焦于令人畏惧的维京海盗。基督徒和穆斯林可以派遣传教士来使原始宗教徒皈依，从而阻止他们对土地的劫掠。原始宗教徒可以以「逝往神灵」的名义反击，甚至从此消灭欧洲的一神教信徒。或者，原始宗教可以借助亚伯拉罕信仰的元素，改革自我——一个改革过的拥有他们自己宗教领袖和神圣经典的信仰。

通过劫掠和冒险让你体验到真正的维京传统！

original:
Description: 
Sons of Abraham focuses on the three Abrahamic religions: Christianity, Islam, and Judaism. 

Get your bishops appointed cardinals and tap into the might of the Papacy. The College of Cardinals is the succession law to elect the Pope. Having good relations with the current Pope now has more benefits, you can request money, Crusades, and more. 
You may also borrow money from the Knights Templar (or other Holy Orders for your character’s religion) and send troublesome relatives off to live out their days in a monastery. 

Muslim Sunnis can now select between the Mu'tazilite and Ash'ari Traits, representing a particular belief Sunni Islam. 

Play as the Jewish religion and attempt to recreate the Kingdom of Israel and rebuild the Third Temple in Jerusalem.
translation:
描述：
「亚伯拉罕之裔」聚焦于亚伯拉罕诸教：基督教，伊斯兰教和犹太教。

让你的主教受任枢机并利用好教廷的力量。枢机团拥有选举教宗的权力。与现任教宗保持良好的关系会让你受益匪浅，你可以请求资助，请求十字军远征等等。
你也可以向圣殿骑士团借钱（或是你角色信仰的其他圣骑士团），还能将讨人厌的亲戚送到修道院度过他们的余生。

逊尼派穆斯林现在可以在穆尔太齐赖和艾什尔里特质中二者取其一，这代表着逊尼派伊斯兰教的独特教义。

扮演犹太教角色，并尝试去恢复以色列王国，重建耶路撒冷的第三圣殿。

original:
Description: 
Rise from the ashes of turmoil and anarchy to rule over a land fragmented into petty fiefs. Now is the time to take control. Now is the time for greatness! 

Rajas of India focuses on Eastern Persia and India. With the updated cultures in the area, comes three new playable religions: 
Hinduism, a caste system relying on Traits, patron deities, and the ability to raid. 
Buddhism grants a learning bonus and the possibility to remove negative Traits. 
Jainism, peaceful and stable but without access to holy war Casus Belli. 

Can you defend Dharma against foreign invaders and bring order to the subcontinent?
translation:
描述：
从动荡和无序的灰烬之中崛起，统治这片四分五裂的土地。把握命运，伟大的时刻已经到来！

「印度罗阇」聚焦于波斯东部和整个印度。伴随着该地区文化的更新，三种全新的可扮演宗教随之而来：
印度教，基于特质的种姓制度、守护神和劫掠能力。
佛教，赋予学习能力的奖励和消除负面特质的可能性。
耆那教，和平而稳定的宗教，但是不能以圣战为由发动战争。

你能否捍卫正法对抗外国入侵者，并为这片次大陆带来秩序？

original:
Description: 
This expansion moves the game back almost a 100 years to 769 AD and will offer a unique new story-driven narrative about the rise of Charlemagne and The Holy Roman Empire. It is more of what you have come to know and love from Paradox Development Studios. 

Not only is there a new start date, this expansion also features a Viceroyalty system where non-tribal emperor tier characters will be able to appoint viceroys (lifetime governorship, the title goes back to the liege on death). Additionally, you can now create new dynamic/fantasy kingdoms and empires based on your current duchy or kingdom. 

Explore one of the defining periods in world history in an experience crafted by the masters of Strategy brings medieval times to life in this epic game of knights, schemes, and thrones.
translation:
描述：
「查理曼」扩展包将游戏开始时间提前了将近 100 年至公元 769 年，并提供了新的关于查理曼的崛起和神圣罗马帝国的剧情故事。这将拓展你对于 Paradox 开发工作室作品的认知和喜爱。

除了增加了一个新的剧本，还大幅修整了总督制系统，非部落政体的皇帝级别角色将能够任命总督（终身制，总督死后头衔回到其上级领主）。此外，现在你可以基于你目前的公国或王国创建新的动态/空想王国或帝国。

战略大师们在这个骑士、阴谋和王座的史诗游戏中，将中世纪展现的栩栩如生。在这场由他们所精心打造的体验中，探索这一世界历史的决定性时期吧。

original:
Description: 
Face up to the toil, struggle, pain, strife and hardships of leadership in this expansion for Crusader Kings II. 

The Way of Life DLC allows you to live life the way you like, be it as a peaceful mystic, a family man or a master of war. Each of the ten available focus will tell a different tale and presents an opportunity to forge your path to success by setting your focus and shaping the destiny of your empire. 

Set a Focus (a "Way of Life") for your character to give them an immediate skill boost, develop their abilities and determine the kind of events and decisions they tend to get. There are a total of ten focuses, two focuses for each character attribute: 
Rulership, Business, Hunting, War, Family, Carousing, Seduction, Intrigue, Scholarship, and Theology.
translation:
描述：
在这个《王国风云II》的扩展包里，领袖的辛劳、挣扎、痛苦、纷争和艰辛将得到证实。

「生活之道」DLC让你活出想要的自己，成为一名平和的神秘主义者，一个热爱家庭的人，或一位战争大师。十个焦点中的每一个都将讲述一段不同的故事，并为你提供机会，让你通过设定焦点与塑造帝国命运来打造你的成功之道。

为你的角色设定一个生活重心（即一项「生活之道」），让他迅速获得属性点，发展个人能力，并在事件中体验他所倾向的选择。
总共有十个生活重心，每个属性有两个：统治、商业、狩猎、战争、家庭、狂欢、勾引、密谋、学术和神学。

original:
Description: 
Horse Lords offers expanded gameplay based on the vibrant cultures of the Eurasian steppes. New game mechanics are introduced such as a new government form, Nomadic. 

Clans work differently from the usual vassals, they are distinct families and factions within the nomad group. You can now also have tributary states, a diplomatic relationship that forces defeated enemies to fill the Khan’s coffers. Saddle up and build your empire from horseback. 
Expanding and controlling trade on the ancient Silk Road to finance your conquests is an option, but others will also try to gain control of these lucrative routes, and enemy raiders may try to destroy your trade posts if you do not guard them. 

The time has come to take the reins of history and become the Great Khan!
translation:
描述：
基于欧亚大草原充满活力的文化，游牧领主提供了多样化的玩法。引入了新的游戏机制，例如新的政体——游牧制。

不同于封建封臣，部族是由游牧群体中的家族或派系组成的。你现在可以拥有朝贡国，这是一种强迫败在你手下的敌人向你朝贡、充实可汗金库的外交关系。备上马鞍，建立你马背上的帝国吧。
拓展及支配古老丝绸之路的贸易为你的征服行动提供财力支持是个不错的选择，不过要注意其他国家也会试图控制这条收获不菲的黄金之路。此外，如果不部署防卫设施，敌军劫掠者可能会意图摧毁你的贸易站。

成为支配历史的伟大可汗的时候到了！

original:
Description: 
Conclave gives your vassals some bite to go along with their bark. Now the council that governs your realm will now demand some say in how you rule. Powerful dukes, regardless of competence, wants a seat at the table. Those left on the outside will be more likely to plot against you, unless you can buy their loyalty with favors. You can try to limit their power and influence as they vote on changes to realm laws. 

The education system for royal children has been revised. With childhood traits and a childhood focus, you can now select their education focus to groom them to the heir you need. A child’s attributes now also grow with some genetic influence from the parents. 

With the new game systems of Conclave comes a rework of the law system and new realm laws such as Status of Women.
translation:
描述：
「御前会议」为你封臣们的喧嚣带来一些锐气。现在，管理王国的内阁将对你的统治索求话语权。强力的公爵，无论能力如何，都想在会议桌上谋求一席之地。而被阻隔在外的人们更有可能密谋策反你，除非你能用恩惠收买他们的忠心。你可以尝试遏制他们在投票决定王国法案上的力量与影响。

统治者子嗣的教育系统已经被改良。通过童年特质以及一个童年焦点，你可以控制他们的教育重心，以期培养出你所需要的继承人。孩子的属性现在和父母有一定的遗传关系。

「御前会议」的新系统将带来重制的法律系统和全新的领地法律，比如女性地位法。

original:
Description: 
Little remains of those settlements where the Black Death has passed through. Hasty burials make a mockery of the sacraments and set a feast for the crows. The lord of these once prosperous land hides away – secluded in his hilltop fortress, hoping the plague will pass him by. But, in time, all must pay The Reaper’s Due. 

The new mechanics introduced are centered around the Black Death and other epidemics. Lock your gates to keep the plague from infecting your court, even if it means paying less heed to your suffering citizens. Peace will reward you with wealth, but war and disease depopulate your lands.
You can now hire a court physician who will diagnose and treat illnesses using old medieval ways. In addition, you can slow down the spread of epidemics by investing in hospitals that care for the sick and infirm.
translation:
描述：
黑死病所经过的聚居地一片荒芜。仓促的葬事使得圣礼沦为笑柄，也成为了乌鸦的盛宴。昔日繁荣之地的领主躲藏起来——隔绝在他山顶的要塞中，希望瘟疫和他擦肩而过。然而，死神带走一切只是早晚的问题。

引入新的围绕着黑死病和其他流行病的机制。锁上你的大门，以免瘟疫感染到你的宫廷，即使这意味着漠视你正饱受磨难的子民。和平将以财富回馈你，而战争和疾病将使你的土地人口锐减。
你现在可以雇佣宫廷医师，他们将用中世纪古法诊断并治疗疾病。此外，你可以投资建设医院来照顾病弱，从而减缓流行病的传播。

original:
Description: 
For centuries, the abbeys of Europe have had a sacred mission, to keep the faith strong through an era of strife and lead the powers on a righteous path. Societies are spreading throughout the known world enforcing their own goals and agendas. 
Your characters can earn new powers as they climb the ranks of their chosen Society. 

Monastic Orders - Stay on the holy path of good works. 
Devil Worship - Worship the dark lords for great powers. 
Assassins - Strike at those who undermine the faith. 
Hermetics - Unlock secrets through alchemy and astrology. 

This expansion also features new events, and new Orders for Councilors, meaning that your closest advisors will never be idle as they can use their Talents while safe in your castle.
translation:
描述：
数百年来，全欧洲的修道院有着一个神圣的使命：坚守信仰，度过这个充满灾祸的时代，并将力量引至正途。社团在已知的世界四处扩张，执行着他们的目标与议程。
你的角色可以在他们所选择的社团内不断晋升，获得全新的能力。

宗教团体——在行善的神圣道路上矢志不渝
魔鬼崇拜——通过崇拜恶魔来获得强大的力量
阿萨辛——打击玷污信仰之人
赫耳墨斯学会——通过炼金术和占星术揭示秘密

本扩展包将同时带来新事件和针对内阁成员的新命令，这意味着和你最亲近的顾问能够展现他们的才华，不会安然地在你的城堡中无所事事。

original:
Description: 
Interact with China for protection and technological marvels - and possibly face their wrath in the form of rebels or full-scale invasions. Flatter the Emperor with gifts of gold or concubines to earn his grace. Ask favors from the mighty prince, and stay on the good side of his appointed marshals on your borders. 

Introducing new gameplay features, like the new Tributary system, where you can submit to the Empire as a tributary or establish Permanent Tributary States yourself. However, keep an eye on the waning power of the Emperor so that you can time your escape to freedom. 

Jade Dragon also comes with unique Chinese Units, new types of invasions and wars. Two new religions (Taoism and Bön), Chinese artifacts, and much more that will make the nearby regions come alive with new surprises and challenges for even the most seasoned despot.
translation:
描述：
通过与中国互动获得庇护与先进的技术——也可能因背叛或全面入侵而直面其震怒。以金钱与侍妾为礼物来讨好圣上，从而获得他的皇恩。从强大的天子处请求恩赐，并与他任命在你边境上的都护维持良好关系。

引入新的游戏机制，例如新的朝贡体系，你可以作为朝贡国顺从圣上，或者建立自己的永久朝贡国。不过，留心皇帝日渐式微的力量，你可以趁此机会逃向自由。

「碧玉之龙」也带来了独特的中国单位、全新的入侵和战争形式。两种新宗教（道教和苯教）、中华宝物以及许多其他内容，这将使中国的周围地区充满生机，即使是经验最丰富的君主也会感到惊喜和挑战。

original:
Main Features: 
- 50 unique dynastic shields for 50 famous families of Medieval Europe 

This pack contains the Coat of Arms of the 50 most famous and prestigious families of Medieval Europe. You will be able to see the dynasty shields in the character info.
translation:
主要特性：
－在欧洲中世纪有名的 50 个家族的特殊盾徽。

此包包含在欧洲中世纪有名望的 50 个家族的盾徽。你可以在角色信息看到盾徽。

original:
Main Features: 
- Unique graphic units for characters of African cultures 

Enhance your Crusader Kings II experience with these unique unit graphics for the African states south of the Sahara, such as Nubia, Abyssinia, Mali, Songhay, Ghana
translation:
主要特性：
－非洲文化人物的特殊单位模型

通过撒哈拉沙漠以南非洲各国，如努比亚、阿比西尼亚、马里、桑海、加纳的特殊单位模型增强你《王国风云II》的游戏体验。

original:
Main Features: 
- 50 unique dynastic shields for 50 famous families of Medieval Europe. 

Enhance your Crusader Kings II experience with these historically accurate shields. The Dynasty Shields Pack contains the insignias of 50 famous families from Medieval Europe.
translation:
主要特性：
－在欧洲中世纪有名的 50 个家族的特殊盾徽。

通过这些符合历史的盾徽增强你的《王国风云II》游戏体验。盾徽包包含在欧洲中世纪有名的 50 个家族标致。

original:
Main Features: 
- Unique graphic units for characters of Byzantine cultures 

Enhance your Crusader Kings II experience with the Byzantine Unit Pack. This content pack adds unique unit graphics in the Byzantine Empire and other Greek, Armenian or Georgian states.
translation:
主要特性：
－拜占庭文化人物的特殊单位模型

通过「拜占庭单位包」增强你《王国风云II》的游戏体验。这个内容包增加拜占庭帝国和其他希腊、亚美尼亚或格鲁吉亚的特殊单位模型。

original:
Main Features: 
- Unique face combinations for characters of African cultures 

Enhance your Crusader Kings II Experience with the African Portraits pack with a particular focus on Western Africa. This content pack adds thousands of unique face combinations to both male and female characters in the African states south of the Sahara, including Mali, Songhay, and Ghana.
translation:
主要特性：
－非洲文化角色的特殊面部组合

通过「非洲肖像包」来增强你在《王国风云II》中的游戏体验，此内容包为南撒哈拉地区马里、桑海和加纳等非洲邦国里的男女角色增加了数千种面部组合。

original:
Main Features: 
- Unique face combinations for characters of Mediterranean cultures 

Mediterranean Portraits adds new clothing and thousands of unique face combinations for both male and female characters while playing as Mediterranean Nations. 
With the release of the Iberian Portraits pack, owners of the Mediterranean Portrait packs will receive the new, updated Mediterranean portraits for free.
translation:
主要特性：
－地中海文化人物的独特面部组合

「地中海肖像包」为地中海国家的男女角色增加了新服饰以及数千种独一无二的面部组合。
随着「伊比利亚肖像包」的发售，已拥有「地中海肖像包」的用户将免费获得更新过的地中海肖像。

original:
Main Features: 
- Unique graphic units for characters of Russian cultures 

Enhance your Crusader Kings II Experience with the Russian Unit Pack. The Russian Unit Pack adds unique unit graphics for the Russian and Alan cultures.
translation:
主要特性：
－罗斯文化人物的特殊单位模型

通过「罗斯单位包」增强你《王国风云II》的游戏体验。罗斯单位包增加罗斯和阿兰文化的特殊模型。

original:
Main Features: 
- Unique face combinations for characters of Russian cultures 

Enhance your Crusader Kings II experience with the Russian Portraits pack. This pack adds new intricate clothing and thousands of unique face combinations for both male and female characters while playing Russian and Alan characters.
translation:
主要特性：
－罗斯文化人物的独特面部组合

通过「罗斯肖像包」增强你《王国风云II》的游戏体验。此包在你以罗斯和阿兰文化人物进行游戏时添加复杂的服饰与数千个男性和女性人物脸部的组合。

original:
Main Features: 
- Unique face combinations for characters of Norse cultures 

Enhance your Crusader Kings II experience with the Norse Portraits Pack. This content pack adds thousands of unique face combinations for northern Europe including Sweden, Denmark, and Norway.
translation:
主要特性：
－诺斯文化组人物的独特面部组合

「诺斯肖像包」将增强你的《王国风云II》游戏体验。本内容包为北欧，包括瑞典、丹麦和挪威，增加了数千种独特的面部组合。

original:
Main Features: 
- Unique graphic units for characters of Norse cultures 

Enhance your Crusader Kings II experience with the Norse Unit Pack. This content pack adds unique graphics for countries in northern Europe including Sweden, Denmark, and Norway. 
Expect beards, axes and that pagan feeling to terrify neighboring regions.
translation:
主要特性：
－诺斯文化组人物的独特单位模型

用「诺斯单位包」增强你的《王国风云II》游戏体验。本内容包为北欧，包括瑞典、丹麦和挪威，增加了独特的模型。
准备好用胡子、斧头以及原始宗教的氛围震慑你周边的地盘吧。

original:
Main Features: 
- Unique graphic units for characters of Celtic cultures 

Although having adopted the arms and traditions of a new era, the roots of the Celtic warriors remain strong. 
Enhance your Crusader Kings II experience with the Celtic Unit Pack. This content pack adds unique graphics for the Irish, Scottish, Welsh and Breton armies.
translation:
主要特性：
－凯尔特文化人物的独特单位模型

虽然已经接受了新时代的武器和传统，凯尔特武士的根基依旧强劲。
用「凯尔特单位包」增强你的《王国风云II》游戏体验。本内容包为爱尔兰、苏格兰、威尔士和布列塔尼军队增加了独特的模型。

original:
Main Features: 
- Unique face combinations for characters of Celtic cultures 

Enhance your Crusader Kings II experience further with the Celtic Portraits pack. This content pack adds thousands of unique face combinations for male and female characters of the Celtic cultures including Irish, Scottish, Welsh and Breton characters.
translation:
主要特性：
－凯尔特文化人物的独特面部组合

「凯尔特肖像包」将增强你《王国风云II》的游戏体验。本内容包添加了数千个爱尔兰、苏格兰、威尔士和布莱顿文化男性和女性的独特面部组合。

original:
Main Features: 
- 50 dynastic shields for 50 famous families of Medieval Europe, with a focus on pagan families. 

This pack contains historically accurate Coat of Arms for 50 famous families of Medieval Europe. 
The Dynasty Shields III DLC pays special attention to the pagan families of The Old Gods.
translation:
主要特性：
－以原始宗教家族为焦点，在欧洲中世纪有名的 50 个家族的盾徽。

此包包含在欧洲中世纪有名的 50 个家族盾徽。
盾徽 III 扩展包特别关注了崇拜古神的原始宗教家族。

original:
Main Features: 
- Unique graphic units for characters of Christian Military Orders 

Crusader Kings II: Military Orders Unit Pack includes unique unit graphics for the Military Orders of the Christian faith. 
These seven new unit models will enhance the visual experience of Crusader Kings II.
translation:
主要特性：
－基督教骑士团的独特单位模型

「骑士团单位包」囊括了基督教骑士团的独特单位模型。
这七种新模型将增强《王国风云II》的视觉体验。

original:
Main Features: 
- Unique graphic units for characters of Non-Christian Holy Orders 

Warriors of Faith Unit Pack includes unique unit graphics for Holy Orders and Warriors of Faith for non-Christian religions such as Islam, Norse, Zoroastrians, and Aztecs. 
A total of eleven new unit models enhances the visual experience of Crusader Kings II when raising holy orders of the non-Christian religions.
translation:
主要特性：
－非基督教骑士团的独特单位模型

「信仰战士单位包」囊括了非基督教，比如伊斯兰教、诺斯宗教、祆教以及阿兹特克宗教骑士团的独特单位模型。
总计十一种新单位模型将在招募非基督教骑士团时增强《王国风云II》视觉体验。

original:
Main Features: 
- Unique graphic units for characters of the Saxon culture 

Enhance your Crusader Kings II experience with the Saxon Unit Pack. The Saxon Unit Pack adds seven new, unique unit models for Saxon rulers.
translation:
主要特性：
－萨克森文化角色的独特单位模型

「萨克森单位包」能够为您在《王国风云II》中提供更好的游戏体验。萨克森单位包为萨克森统治者们加入了七个全新而独特的单位模型。

original:
Main Features: 
- Unique graphic units for characters of Finno-Ugric cultures 

Enhance your Crusader Kings II experience with the Finno-Ugric Unit Pack. The Finno-Ugric Unit Pack adds seven new, unique unit models for Finnish, Lappish, Komi, Nenets and Mordvin rulers.
translation:
主要特性：
－芬兰－乌戈尔文化角色的独特单位模型

「芬兰－乌戈尔单位包」能够为您在《王国风云II》中提供更好的游戏体验。芬兰－乌戈尔单位包为芬兰、拉普兰、科米、涅涅茨和莫尔多瓦统治者们加入了七个全新而独特的单位模型。

original:

－重新为你所有后代的新生儿起名
－为私生子家族命名
－重新命名公国及以上等级的头衔，包括其形容词形式

你觉得你的角色胡须难看吗？刮了它！（同时换个发型）想把你的王国叫做 「棒呆了王国」？改了它！
你手下忠臣的家族名称或盾徽看起来很蠢吗？自己来定制吧！定制包允许你在游戏中改变所有这些事物。
它不会改变游戏的玩法，但可能会让你内心更清净。

original: Title: $TITLE$
translation: 头衔：$TITLE$

original: "Orhan Gazi was the second bey of the Ottoman Sultanate. The name of the dynasty comes from Osman I, Orhan's father, while the realm he inherited was only a small principality during Osman's lifetime, transformed into a world empire in the centuries after his death."\n
translation: 「奥尔汗·加齐是奥斯曼苏丹国的第二任贝伊。这个王朝的名字来源于他的父亲奥斯曼一世，奥尔汗继承的只是奥斯曼建立的小公国，而这个小公国在他死后的几个世纪里成为了一个世界性帝国。」\n

original: "Suleyman founded an independent Seljuq Turkish state in Anatolia and ruled as Seljuq Sultan of Rum. His father had struggled against Alp Arslan for the throne of Great Seljuq Empire. Suleyman fled with his three brothers after his father died, but only he alone survived the raids launched by Alp Arslan."\n
translation: 「苏莱曼在安纳托利亚建立了一个独立的塞尔柱突厥国家，号称罗姆的塞尔柱苏丹。他的父亲曾与阿尔普·阿尔斯兰争夺大塞尔柱帝国的皇位。苏莱曼在他父亲死后和他三个兄弟一同逃走，但只有他一个人在阿尔普·阿尔斯兰的追捕中幸免于难。」\n

original: "Saladin, by order of his lord, was sent to Fatimid Egypt in 1164. In 1169, al-Adid appointed Saladin, a Sunni Muslim, as his vizier in the Isma'ili Shia caliphate. Saladin began to undermine the establishment, and when al-Adid died, he abolished the Fatimid Caliphate."\n
translation: 「萨拉丁于 1164 年被他领主派往法蒂玛王朝。1169 年，法蒂玛苏丹阿迪德却任命身为逊尼派穆斯林的萨拉丁为伊斯玛仪什叶派哈里发国的维齐尔。于是萨拉丁开始削弱当权派，当阿迪德死后，他取代了法蒂玛王朝。」\n

original: "Alexios I Komnenos was the Byzantine emperor during the First Crusade. He faced constant warfare against both the Seljuq Turks and the Normans. Alexios appealed to Western Europe for help against the Turks and was able to curb the Byzantine decline, known as the Komnenian restoration."\n
translation: 「阿莱克修斯一世·科穆宁是第一次十字军东征期间的拜占庭皇帝。他面临着塞尔柱突厥人和诺曼人持续不断的进攻。阿莱克修斯求助于西欧抵御了突厥人的入侵，同时还遏制了拜占庭的衰落，后世称为科穆宁中兴。」\n

original: "Basil I was a Byzantine Emperor who was born a simple peasant in the military-civilian province of Macedonia. He was seen as one of their greatest emperors by his people and ruled over the most glorious and prosperous era of the Byzantine Empire."\n
translation: 「巴西尔一世出生在马其顿军民行省的一户身份低微的农民家庭中。他被人民视为最伟大的皇帝之一，统治着拜占庭帝国最辉煌最繁荣的时代。」\n

original: "Theodoros I Komnenos Laskaris was the first Emperor of Nicaea, born into a noble family of Constantinople. Theodore married the daughter of the Byzantine Emperor Alexios III and distinguished himself during the sieges of Constantinople by the Latins of the Fourth Crusade."\n
translation: 「狄奥多罗斯一世·科穆宁·拉斯卡里斯是尼西亚帝国的第一位皇帝，出生于君士坦丁堡的贵族家庭。狄奥多罗斯迎娶了拜占庭皇帝阿莱克修斯三世的女儿，并在第四次十字军东征的君士坦丁堡围城中大显身手。」\n

original: "Ioannes II Komnenos was the second Byzantine Emperor to rule during the Komnenian restoration. He was a pious and dedicated monarch who focused on rebuilding the empire from the damage it had suffered from the battle of Manzikert. The empire's population recovered greatly."\n
translation: 「约安尼斯二世·科穆宁是科穆宁中兴时期的第二位拜占庭皇帝。他是一个虔诚而有奉献精神的君主。他致力于重建帝国，使其从曼齐刻尔特战役的创伤中摆脱出来。帝国的人口很大程度地恢复了。」\n

original: "There are multiple theories for how this Viking leader got the nickname 'the boneless.' Some say it was the result of a curse, and others think it's the result of miscommunication. While the sagas detail his physical disability, they also highlight his mastery of strategy as he invaded what is now England."\n
translation: 「关于这位维京领袖的绰号『无骨者』有多种说法。有人说这是诅咒的后果，而另一些人则认为这是误传的结果。虽然传奇故事详细描述了他身体上的伤残，但同时也强调了他在入侵英格兰时的雄才大略。」\n

original: "The Umayyad Caliphate at its peak was one of the largest empires in history. But after the Abbasid Revolt in the 740, the realm is now the southern part of today's Spain. History, as we know, tends to repeat itself and Muhammad I's reign had several revolts and separatists movements."\n
translation: 「伍麦叶哈里发国在巅峰时期位列历史上最大的帝国之一。但 740 年在阿拔斯叛乱之后，领地缩水为现今西班牙的南部。历史循环往复，人尽皆知，穆罕默德一世的治下也有数次叛乱与分裂运动。」\n

original: "As Afonso II stepped up to the role as King of Portugal, he took a different approach than his father. Afonso didn't view military issues as a priority, and instead designed the first set of Portuguese written laws. He managed to keep security within his borders by only using peaceful methods."\n
translation: 「当阿方索二世即位成为葡萄牙国王时，他采取了和他父亲完全不同的统治方式。阿方索并没有将军事问题当做优先选项，而是设立了一套葡萄牙成文法。他明智的使用和平的方法维护了国境和平」\n

original: "Being the youngest of three, García was given Galicia and Seville, while his eldest brother Sancho II received the Kingdom of Castile. His other brother, Alfonso VI, inherited the Kingdom of León. He was imprisoned by his siblings as they sought to capture his realm."\n
translation: 「作为三兄弟中最小的一个，加西亚被授予加利西亚和塞维利亚，而他的长兄桑乔二世则获得卡斯蒂利亚王国。他的另一个兄弟阿方索六世继承了莱昂王国。他的兄弟们试图夺取他的王国时囚禁了他。」\n

original: "Enrico Dandolo, a famous blind Patrician, 41st Doge of Venice but the first to swear an oath of office as he took on the role. Renowned for his leadership in the Fourth Crusade, Enrico is remembered to have ushered an era of prosperity to the Venetian Republic."\n
translation: 「恩里科·丹多洛是一位著名的盲眼贵人，他是威尼斯第 41 任总督但却是第一位宣誓就职的。恩里科因他在第四次十字军东征的领导地位而闻名，他为威尼斯共和国带来了一个繁荣的时代而受人铭记。」\n

original: "The city of Visby is known to have been a center of mercantile as early as 900. With access to fresh water and a natural harbor, the town flourished as part of the German Hanseatic League."\n
translation: 「维斯比市早在公元 900 年就是知名商业中心。市镇拥有充足的淡水和天然港湾，后来它作为德意志汉萨同盟的一部分蓬勃发展。」\n

original: "The Hanseatic League (the Hansa) was a confederation of merchant guilds that dominated the Baltic maritime. As a vassal of the Holy Roman Empire, with the Republic Expansion you can play as this merchant league that dominated the Baltic trade for 300 years."\n
translation: 「汉萨同盟是控制波罗的海海运的商人行会联合会。作为神圣罗马帝国的附庸，拥有『共和国』扩展包你就可以扮演主导波罗的海贸易300年的商人联盟。」\n

original: "Located in the north Ligurian Sea, Genoa was an independent state from 1005 and is one of the essential historic ports on the Mediterranean. Through participation in the Crusades, Genoese gained additional soil in Northern Africa, the Middle East, and other areas."\n
translation: 「热那亚位于利古里亚海北部，从公元 1005 年起开始成为一个独立的国家，是地中海重要的历史港口之一。通过参与十字军远征，热那亚人在北非、中东和其他地区获得了更多的土地。」\n

original: "The House of Karen, also known as Karen-Pahlavi, was an aristocratic feudal family with their seat of the house at Nahavand. In 783, the Karenas proclaimed independence and remained independent until the 11th century, with some successful temporary attempts in conquering them notwithstanding."\n
translation: 「凯伦家族，又称凯伦－巴列维，是以纳哈万德为中心的封建贵族。783 年，凯伦宣布独立并保持独立直到十一世纪，尽管某几次征服他们的尝试曾短暂成功过。」\n

original: "The ‘Ironside’ nickname stems from the legends that he never got wounded in battle due to the witchcraft his mother had used to make him invulnerable. The tales mentioning King Björn were written long after his reign and contained mythological elements, making the reliability of the source unproven."\n
translation: 「传说其母以巫术使其刀枪不入，因而他在战斗中永不受伤，获得『铁骨』之名。提及比约恩国王的叙述在他统治结束后许久方才写下，且含有神话色彩，令史料来源的可靠性无法考证。」\n

original: "Árpád Álmos is who many refer to as the 'founder of Hungary.' He was the head of the Confederation of the Hungarian tribes and whose role might have been being their sacred ruler or military leader. The uncertainty of what his role was is the contradictory information between different sources."\n
translation: 「阿帕德·阿尔莫什，人称『匈牙利国父』。他是匈牙利部落联盟的首领，也可能是具有神性的统治者或军事领袖。他具体扮演了怎样的角色在不同史料中有相互矛盾的说法。」\n

original: "Erik Årsäll is a semi-historical king of Sweden said to be the pagan contender for the Swedish throne after the death of King Stenkil. The war changed the kingdom and Christianity was disturbed to a high degree."\n
translation: 「埃里克·奥塞尔是一名半史实的瑞典国王，据说在斯滕希尔国王死后，他是王位的原始宗教觊觎者。战争改变了王国，基督教受到严重动摇。」\n

original: "The Kingdom of Axum was a trading empire located in northern Ethiopia. It was a significant trade post on the commercial route between the Roman Empire and Ancient India. It’s also claimed to be the resting place of the Ark of the Covenant and the purported home of the Queen of Sheba."\n
translation: 「阿克苏姆王国是位于埃塞俄比亚北部的一个贸易帝国。它是罗马和古印度之间商路上的重要商栈。有传说称阿克苏姆是圣约柜的庇护所和示巴女王的故居。」\n

original: "Menasseh ben Zebulun was a Turkic Jewish ruler that most likely ruled in the late ninth century. As with other Bulanid rulers, it is unclear whether Menasseh was a spiritual ruler with limited powers or if his tasks were administration and military affairs."\n
translation: 「玛拿西·本·西布伦是一名突厥犹太教统治者，很可能生活于九世纪末期。与其他布兰家族的统治者一样，还不清楚玛拿西只是一名有限权力的精神领袖，抑或他其实负责行政与军事。」\n

original: "Renaud of Châtillon joined the Second Crusade after losing a part of his birthright. He married Constance, the reigning Princess of Antioch. Renaud was the only Christian leader to pursue an offensive policy against Saladin. He was captured by Saladin and beheaded after he refused to convert to Islam."\n
translation: 「沙蒂永的雷诺在失去部分继承权后加入了第二次十字军。他与时任安条克女亲王康斯坦丝结婚。雷诺是唯一对萨拉丁推行进攻政策的基督教统治者。他被萨拉丁俘虏并拒绝改宗伊斯兰，因而被斩首。」\n

original: "Baudouin I was the first emperor of the Latin Empire. Before that, he was Baudouin of Flanders, one of the most prominent leaders of the Fourth Crusade. The sack of Constantinople and conquest of large parts of the Byzantine Empire laid the foundation of the Latin Empire."\n
translation: 「鲍德温一世是拉丁帝国第一位皇帝。在当上皇帝前，他是佛兰德斯的伯爵，第四次十字军东征的最杰出领导者之一。拉丁帝国奠基于对君士坦丁堡的劫掠和对拜占庭帝国大量领土的征服之上。」\n

original: "Krishna I was the 2nd Emperor of the Rashtrakuta Empire. How exactly Krishna came to power is a discussed topic, some believe that he usurped the throne from his nephew Dantidurga, others think he ascended the throne after the death of Dantidurga."\n
translation: 「奎师那一世是罗湿陀罗拘陀帝国的第二任皇帝。奎师那如何当权仍有争议，有认为他篡夺了其侄子檀底突伽的皇位，其他人相信他在檀底突伽死后登基。」\n

original: "Vijayabahu I was a medieval king of Sri Lanka. He grew up at a time when the Chola Kingdom of Tamilakam had invaded parts of the island. In 1055, he assumed rulership and launched a campaign to drive the Chola out. In 1070 he had reunited the country for the first time in over a century. "\n
translation: 「毗阇耶婆呼一世是中世纪的一位斯里兰卡国王。他成长于耽弥罗迦摩的朱罗王国入侵斯里兰卡岛时期。在 1055 年，他执政并发动了一场驱逐朱罗入侵者的战役。在 1070 年，他终于统一了这个分裂了超过一个世纪的国家」\n

original: "Dharmapala was the son of Gopala, the founder of the Pala Dynasty, the empire located in the Bengal region in the Indian Subcontinent. He significantly expanded the size of the Pala empire during his reign, and made his dynasty the most powerful of all in the northern and eastern India."\n
translation: 「达摩波罗是瞿波罗之子，波罗王朝的建立者，其帝国位于印度次大陆的旁伽罗地区。他在位期间极大地扩张了波罗帝国的版图，使波罗王朝成为整个北印度和东印度最强大的势力。」\n

original: "Singhana II is believed to be the most powerful ruler of the Seuna dynasty of Deccan region in India. The power the Chalukya had in the region was beginning to dwindle, so the Seuna dynasty who had initially ruled as feudatories declared independence around the middle of the 12th century."\n
translation: 「僧诃那二世被认为是位于印度德干地区的犀浮那王朝最强大的统治者。大约在十二世纪中期，由于遮娄其王朝的统治力衰弱，原本作为封臣的犀浮那王朝趁机获得了独立。」\n

original: "Charlemagne, also known as King Karl I. He became king following his father's death, and initially had his brother as co-ruler, Carloman I. The suspicious sudden death of his brother's was the first steps for Charlemagne towards acquiring the Holy Roman Empire."\n
translation: 「查理曼，也被称为卡尔一世国王。在父亲死后，他作为国王和他的兄弟卡洛曼一世共同统治父亲的王国。他兄弟可疑的突然死亡是查理曼获得神圣罗马帝国的第一步。」\n

original: "Offa, a Christian king that many views as the most powerful Anglo-Saxon king before Alfred the Great. He was King of Mercia, a kingdom of Anglo-Saxon England and came to the throne after a period of civil war."\n
translation: 「奥法被认为是『大帝』阿尔弗雷德之前最强大的盎格鲁撒克逊国王。他在经历内战后成为了英格兰的盎格鲁撒克逊诸王国中麦西亚的国王。」\n

original: "Tassilo, the cousin of Charlemagne and Karloman, began his rule under Frankish overlordship when young. In 763, the Frankish viewed that Tassilo had betrayed the oath he had sworn when he left the battlefield during the Frankish campaign in Aquitaine. Deposed in 788, Tassilo entered a monastery."\n
translation: 「塔西洛，查理大帝与卡洛曼的表兄弟，在法兰克人霸权之下于少年时期就开始了他的统治。763 年，法兰克人认为塔西洛背弃了誓言，因为他在法兰克于阿基坦的战场上擅离职守。塔西洛于 788 年被废黜并归隐修道院。」\n

original: "The Zunbil was a royal dynasty that ruled from the 7th century in Zabulistan, the south of the Hindu Kush in present southern Afghanistan region. The dynasty worshipped the sun, which had parallels with the Hindu god, Surya. Their reign lasted until the Saffarid conquest in 870 AD."\n
translation: 「樽比勒从七世纪起就是统治社护罗萨他那的王族，这个地方在今南阿富汗地区的兴都库什山以南。该王朝崇拜太阳，可以与印度教神灵苏利耶类比。他们的统治持续到 870 年萨法尔的征服为止。」\n

original: "The House of Habsburg is one of the most influential houses in Europe. The dynasty ruled over Basel and other parts of what is now northwestern Switzerland. The Habsburg family went on to become Kings and Emperors of several prominent realms, such as Germany and the Holy Roman Empire."\n
translation: 「哈布斯堡家族是欧洲最有影响力的家族之一。哈布斯堡王朝曾统治着巴塞尔和如今瑞士西北部的其他地区。后来家族成员们陆续获得了德意志地区和神圣罗马帝国的数个国王和皇帝头衔。」\n

original: "In 1066 the formerly great dynasty of Charlemagne had been reduced to ruling one mere County in France. Herbert's son, Eudes, would come to be the last living male member of the dynasty, dying without having produced any children while having earned the nickname ‘the Insane.’"\n
translation: 「1066年，查理大帝曾经辉煌的王朝已衰落到只统治法兰西一块小小的伯爵领。埃贝尔之子厄德将会是这个王朝最后一名男性，他未能生出任何后嗣，还落得个『疯癫者』的绰号。」\n

original: "Known as La Gran Contessa, Matilda is remembered for her military accomplishments. As a firm supporter of Pope Gregory VII, she protected the Church from Emperor Henry IV who wished to inflict the finishing blow on the Church as a result of the Investiture Controversy."\n
translation: 「玛蒂尔达号称伟大的女伯爵，她的军事成就受人铭记。作为教宗额我略七世的坚定支持者，她保护教会，免遭皇帝海因里希四世在叙任权之争中的致命一击。」\n

original: "Henry II was a driven man who was involved in many intrigues during his reign. While focused on restoring the lands of his grandfather, Henry I, his family was plotting on how they would inherit the realm."\n
translation: 「亨利二世是一个发愤图强的人，但在他统治期间却卷入了许多阴谋。当他致力于恢复其祖父亨利一世的领地时，他的家人们却在密谋如何继承王国。」\n

original: "Born as Temüjin, Genghis Khan was the founder of the Mongol Empire. He launched the Mongol invasions that conquered most of Eurasia. Many feared the Great Genghis Khan for his large-scale massacres of the civilian populations and supposedly unstoppable army."\n
translation: 「成吉思汗本名铁木真，是蒙古帝国的建立者。他发动了征服欧亚大部的蒙古入侵。无数人恐惧伟大的成吉思汗，因为他大规模屠杀平民，而且他的军队无人可挡。」\n

original: "Sultan Mohammed Özbeg, was the longest-reigning khan of the Golden Horde under its peak. He assumed the throne upon the death of his uncle Tokhta, and at first, many were against him. Özbeg spread Islam among his people and onwards, all future khans of the Golden Horde were Muslim."\n
translation: 「穆罕默德·月即别苏丹，是金帐汗国统治时间最长的汗王，在其治下达到巅峰。他在其叔父脱脱死后即位，并在初期受到多人反对。月即别在其人民中以及国外传播伊斯兰教，金帐汗国之后的所有汗王都是穆斯林。」\n

original: "The exact origins of the Bulgars and the Dulo clan who were the ruling dynasty are not known. They are, or at least of the elite caste, related to the Huns and Western Turks. The Bulgars were equestrian warriors that migrated from either the region of Kazakhstan or the North Caucasian steppes."\n
translation: 「保加尔人与其王族咄陆部族的确切起源已不可知。他们或者至少他们的统治阶级与匈人或西突厥有关。保加尔人作为骑马武士可能是从哈萨克斯坦地区或北高加索草原迁来。」\n

original: "Zhilugu's reign was plagued by numerous rebellions in the realm. A notable uprising was one instigated by Kuchlug in 1210, he rebelled against his father-in-law, seizing the treasury. Zhilugu defeated Kuchlug, but the Khagan was ambushed and captured by Kuchlug."\n
translation: 「直鲁古在位期间，国家饱受叛乱之灾。其中一个重要的叛乱在 1210 年由屈出律发动，屈出律背叛了他的岳父，夺取其国库。直鲁古可汗虽然一时战胜过屈出律，但最后还是中了埋伏，为屈出律所擒。」\n

original: "Heinrich IV is considered to be one of the most influential and important figures of the 11th century. One of the most famous events in his reign was the Investiture Controversy with the Papacy which made him unpopular with the church. He was excommunicated five times by three different popes."\n
translation: 「海因里希四世被认为是十一世纪最有影响力和最重要的人物之一。他统治期间发生的最著名事件之一是与教廷的激烈论战，这使得他不受教会的欢迎。他共被三个不同的教宗开除了五次教籍。」\n

original: "William I, known as William the Conqueror or William the Bastard was the first Norman King of England. He was the illegitimate son of Robert I, Duke of Normandy. After a long struggle to establish his power, he secured his hold on Normandy in 1060, and he launched the Norman conquest of England."\n
translation: 「威廉一世，被称为征服者威廉或是私生子威廉，是英格兰的第一位诺曼国王。他是诺曼底公爵罗贝尔一世的私生子。在经过长期的斗争后他最终确立了自己的权力，于 1060 年取得了对诺曼底的控制权，他还发动了针对英格兰的诺曼征服。」\n

original: "Philippe I, nicknamed the Amorous, was King of the Franks from 1060 until his death. He was excommunicated in 1095 after marrying another woman while already married. A significant portion of his reign was spent on his power-hungry vassals, putting down their frequent revolts."\n
translation: 「腓力一世『多情者』，从1060年起直至逝世一直是法兰克人的国王。他在1095年时因为与已婚女子再婚而被绝罚。他统治时期的大部分时间都花在了平息他那些权欲熏心的封臣的频繁叛乱上。」\n

original: "King Boleslaw II of Poland had many nicknames, 'the Generous' and 'the Bold' are two examples. Boleslaw II is considered to be one of the most capable Piast rulers as he was the first Polish monarch to produce his coinage in quantity high enough to replace the foreign coins."\n
translation: 「波兰国王博莱斯瓦夫二世有很多绰号，慷慨者和英勇者是其中两例。博莱斯瓦夫二世被认为是皮雅斯特家族最有能力的统治者之一，因为他是第一位制造了足够多货币以替代外国货币的波兰君主。」\n

original: "Alp Arslan is the nickname, meaning Heroic Lion in Turkish, given to Muhammad bin Dawud Chaghri for his military genius and awe-inspiring deeds. He famously humiliated Emperor Romanos IV by releasing him after routing the Byzantine's army and capturing the emperor as a prisoner."\n
translation: 「阿尔普·阿尔斯兰是绰号，突厥语中意为英勇的狮子，穆罕默德·本·达乌德·察合里因他的军事天赋和令人敬畏的行动而获此名号。他著名事迹之一是击溃了拜占庭军队并俘虏了皇帝罗曼努斯四世，狠狠羞辱了他。」\n

original: "Gudrød may have been a son or nephew of the King of Dublin. Little is known about him until he successfully took the island of Man from Fingal in 1079. Eventually, Gudrød was ousted from Dublin and fled to Islay, where he died in the plague of 1095."\n
translation: 「古德罗德可能是都柏林国王的儿子或侄子。他默默无名，直到他在 1079 年成功从芬戈尔手中夺取了马恩岛。但最终，古德罗德被逐出都柏林逃往艾莱，并死于 1095 年的瘟疫。」\n

original: "Baudouin IV, The Leper King who reigned as King of Jerusalem. The first signs that Baudouin was sick was that Baudouin felt no pain. Though he suffered from leprosy, he was able to maintain himself as king and delayed Saladin's campaigns in the Holy Land until his death."\n
translation: 「鲍德温四世，耶路撒冷的麻风王。据说鲍德温因为感觉不到疼痛而被发现染上麻风病。尽管身患麻风，他仍然能够维持自己的强力统治，并且推迟了萨拉丁对圣地的征服战争直到他死亡。」\n

original: "Ferdinand III, nicknamed the Saint (El Santo), was one of the most successful kings of Castile and León but also the mastermind of the most expansive campaign of Reconquista. He led a twenty-year onslaught against the al-Andalus, taking all the Muslim part of Spain but the Emirate of Granada."\n
translation: 「斐迪南三世『圣人』，是卡斯蒂利亚和莱昂最有成就的国王之一，同时也是收复失地运动最大规模战役的策划者。他领导了对安达卢西亚一场长达二十年的进攻，夺回了西班牙除格拉纳达埃米尔国以外的所有穆斯林地区。」\n

original: "Somesvara I was the king of the Western Chalukyas. He launched several successes military conquests in Central India, expanding his vast empire. Near the end of his life, he contracted an incurable disease. Somesvara committed ritual suicide by drowning himself in the Tungabhadra river at Kuruvatti."\n
translation: 「苏迷湿伐罗一世是一位西遮娄其国王。他在中印度发动了数次军事征服，扩张了他辽阔的帝国。临近其生命尽头时，他患上了一种不治之症。苏迷湿伐罗便举行仪式，自投于拘卢伐底的东伽跋陀罗河中，了此一生。」\n

original: "Svend was serving the Danish king Harthacnut as a jarl and led a campaign against Norway. When Harthacnut died in 1042, Magnus, king of Norway, claimed the Danish throne. Crowned by Danish nobles, Svend was defeated by Magnus on several occasions and had to flee to Sweden."\n
translation: 「斯温是丹麦国王哈塔克努特手下的雅尔，领军进攻挪威。1042 年哈塔克努特死后，挪威国王芒努斯宣称丹麦王位。斯温受丹麦贵族拥立为王，却被芒努斯多次击败，不得不逃往瑞典。」\n

original: "The Khön clan is an ancient dynasty dating back to the time of the great Bod Chen Po, or Tibetan Empire. They came to found the Sakya Trizin school of Tibetan Buddhism, which exerted significant influence over the entire plateau for generations."\n
translation: 「款氏源远流长，历史可追溯到吐蕃帝国时期。他们建立了藏传佛教的萨迦派，在数代人的时间里对整个高原施加了重大影响力。」\n

original: "Trison Detsen was the 37th emperor of Tibet. He was the second of the Three Dharma Kings of Tibet, and played a pivotal role in the introduction of Buddhism to the country which laid the groundwork for Tibetan Buddhism."\n
translation: 「赤松德赞是吐蕃第三十七任皇帝。他是吐蕃三法王中的第二位，是引介佛法到全国的关键人物，这为藏传佛教奠定根基。」\n

original: "When the Tibetan Empire plunged into civil war, Zhang Yichao led a rebellion out of Dunhuang. He captured several cities and conquered the Hexi Corridor, ruling the area as a nominal subject of the Tang Empire."\n
translation: 「吐蕃帝国陷入内战之际，张议潮由敦煌领出一支叛军。他攻陷了数座城池并征服河西走廊，以唐帝国臣属的名义统治这片地区。」\n

original: "Ü-Tsang is one of the three traditional provinces of Tibet and is the cultural heartland of the Tibetan people. After Emperor Langdarma's assassination, a civil war arose. It ultimately led to the collapse of the Tibetan Empire and the period that followed is known as the Era of Fragmentation."\n
translation: 「卫藏是西藏三大传统省份之一，是藏族人民的文化中心地带。在赞普朗达玛遇刺后，内战爆发了。它最终导致了吐蕃帝国的崩溃，随后的时期被称为吐蕃分裂时期。」\n

original: King Philippe of France \nDynasty: Capet \nDate: 1066 AD
translation: 法兰西 国王 腓力\n家族：卡佩\n日期：公元 1066 年

original: "Philippe I, nicknamed the Amorous, was King of the Franks from 1060 until his death. After marrying another woman while already married, the pope excommunicated him in 1095. A significant portion of his reign was spent on his power-hungry vassals, putting down their frequent revolts."
translation: 「腓力一世『多情者』，从1060年起直至逝世一直是法兰克人的国王。在和已婚女子再婚后，教宗于1095年对他处以绝罚。他统治时期的大部分时间都花在了平息他那些权欲熏心的封臣的频繁叛乱上。」

original: King Boleslaw the Bold \nDynasty: Piast \nDate: 1066 AD
translation: 国王 博莱斯瓦夫「英勇者」\n家族：皮雅斯特\n日期：公元1066年

original: "King Boleslaw II of Poland had many nicknames, 'the Generous' and 'the Bold' are two examples. Boleslaw II is considered to be one of the most capable Piast rulers as he was the first Polish monarch to produce his coinage in quantity high enough to replace the foreign coins."
translation: 「波兰国王博莱斯瓦夫二世有很多绰号，慷慨者和英勇者是其中两例。博莱斯瓦夫二世被认为是皮雅斯特家族最有能力的统治者之一，因为他是第一位制造了足够多货币以替代外国货币的波兰君主。」

original: King Henry of England \nDynasty: Plantagenet \nDate: 1155 AD
translation: 英格兰 国王 亨利\n家族：金雀花\n日期：公元 1155 年

original: "Henry II was a driven man who was involved in many intrigues during his reign. While compelled to restore the lands of his grandfather, his family were plotting on how they would inherit the realm."
translation: 「亨利二世是一个发愤图强的人，但在他统治期间却卷入了许多阴谋。当他恢复其祖父的领地时，他的家人们却在密谋如何继承王国。」

original: Grand Prince Iziaslav of Kiev \nDynasty: Rurikid \nDate: 1066 AD
translation: 基辅 大公 伊贾斯拉夫\n家族：留里克\n日期：公元 1066 年

original: "Iziaslav Yaroslavich was a son of Yaroslav I. Iziaslav and his brother succeeded their father, and the realm was divided into three, creating the Yaroslavichi triumvirate that ruled the country for the next 20 years. Iziaslav was deposed twice by his brothers but managed to retake Kiev both times."
translation: 「伊贾斯拉夫·雅罗斯拉维奇是伊贾斯拉夫一世·雅罗斯拉维奇的儿子，他和他的兄弟继承了他父亲的事业，王国三分，创造了在未来二十年统治该国的雅罗斯拉维奇三驾马车。伊贾斯拉夫被他的兄弟两次废黜，又两次成功夺回了基辅。」

original: King Charles the Bald \nDynasty: Karling \nDate: 867 AD
translation: 国王 查理「秃头」\n家族：加洛林\n日期：公元 867 年

original: "Charles the Bald had many titles, King of West Francia, King of Italy and Holy Roman Emperor. His father, Louis the Pious, had unsuccessfully tried to assign Charles a subkingdom for many years. It's thought that Charles’ nickname was a facetious reference to his landlessness while growing up."
translation: 「『秃头』查理有很多头衔：西法兰克国王，意大利国王和神圣罗马帝国皇帝。他的父亲『虔诚者』路易试图赐给查理一个单独的封国，却引发了儿子们数年的战争。一般认为查理的绰号『秃头』是对他成长过程中不断丧失领地的调侃。」

original: Kaiser Heinrich of the Holy Roman Empire \nDynasty: Salian \nDate: 1066 AD
translation: 神圣罗马帝国 凯撒 海因里希\n家族：萨利安\n日期：公元 1066 年

original: "Heinrich IV is considered to be one of the most influential and important figures of the 11th century. One of the most famous events in his reign was the Investiture Controversy with the Papacy which made him unpopular with the church. He was excommunicated five times by three different popes."
translation: 「海因里希四世被认为是十一世纪最有影响力和最重要的人物之一。他统治期间发生的最著名事件之一是与教廷的激烈论战，这使得他不受教会的欢迎。他共被三个不同的教宗开除了五次教籍。」

original: Basileus Ioannes of the Byzantine Empire \nDynasty: Batatzes \nDate: 1241 AD
translation: 拜占庭帝国 巴西琉斯 约安尼斯\n家族：巴塔泽\n日期：公元 1241 年

original: "Ioannes III Doukas Batatzes was Emperor of Nicaea from 1222 to 1254. The Batatzes was a noble Byzantine family that become prominent during the Komnenian period. He is a canonized saint, under the name John the Merciful."
translation: 约安尼斯三世·杜卡斯·巴塔泽是1222年至1254年的尼西亚皇帝。巴塔泽是一个拜占庭贵族家庭，在科穆宁时期开始显赫。他以约翰「仁慈者」的名义被册封为圣人。

original: King Fernando of Castille \nDynasty: d'Ivrea \nDate: 1241 AD
translation: 卡斯蒂利亚 国王 费尔南多\n家族：德 伊夫雷亚\n日期：公元 1241 年

original: "Ferdinand III, nicknamed the Saint (El Santo), was one of the most successful kings of Castile and León but also the mastermind of the most expansive campaign of Reconquista. He led a twenty-year onslaught against the al-Andalus, taking all the Muslim part of Spain but the Emirate of Granada."
translation: 「斐迪南三世『圣人』，是卡斯蒂利亚和莱昂最有成就的国王之一，同时也是收复失地运动最大规模战役的策划者。他领导了对安达卢西亚一场长达二十年的进攻，夺回了西班牙除格拉纳达埃米尔国以外的所有穆斯林地区。」

original: King Stenkil of Sweden \nDynasty: Stenkiling \nDate: 1066 AD
translation: 瑞典 国王 斯滕希尔\n家族：斯滕希林\n日期：公元1066年

original: "Stenkil was King of Sweden between 1060 until 1066. He was as a devoted Christian who supported the Christianization of Sweden, yet sympathetic to the old Pagan religion. His death triggered a violent civil war between Christians and pagans, whose relationship he had tried to stabilize."
translation: 「斯滕希尔是1060年至1066年的瑞典国王。他是一位虔诚的基督徒，支持瑞典的基督化，但对古老的原始宗教抱有同情的态度。他试图使两者关系保持稳定，而他的死引发了基督徒和原始宗教徒的暴力内战。」

original:
King Ivar the Boneless 
Dynasty: Ivaring 
Date: 867 AD
translation:
国王 伊瓦尔「无骨者」
家族：伊瓦林
日期：公元867年

original: "There are multiple theories for how this Viking leader got the nickname 'the boneless.' Some say it was the result of a curse, and others think it's the result of miscommunication. While the sagas detail his physical disability, they also highlight his mastery of strategy as he invaded what is now England."
translation: 「关于这位维京领袖的绰号『无骨者』有多种说法。有人说这是诅咒的后果，而另一些人则认为这是误传的结果。虽然传奇故事详细描述了他身体上的伤残，但同时也强调了他在入侵英格兰时的雄才大略。」

original: Emperor Robert of the Latin Empire \nDynasty: de Courtenay \nDate: 1220 AD
translation: 拉丁帝国 皇帝 罗贝尔\n家族：德 库尔特奈\n日期：公元 1220 年

original: "Robert I, also Robert of Courtenay, was the Latin Emperor of Constantinople, whose reign lasted from 1221 to 1228. His elder brother renounced the succession to the Latin empire to Robert. Ousted from Constantinople after a conspiracy, Robert fled to Rome and died on his return trip."
translation: 「罗贝尔一世，也称库尔特奈的罗贝尔，统治时期从 1221 年开始到 1228 年结束，是君士坦丁堡的拉丁帝国皇帝。他的兄长放弃了对拉丁帝国的继承权并转给罗贝尔。罗贝尔在谋反结束后被驱逐出君士坦丁堡，被迫逃亡罗马，在途中死去。」

original: King Philippe of France \nDynasty: de Valois \nDate: 1337 AD
translation: 法兰西 国王 腓力\n家族：德 瓦卢瓦\n日期：公元 1337 年

original: "Philippe VI was the first King of France from the House of Valois. His reign is famous for instigating the Hundred Years' War as a result of a dispute in succession. Edward III of England was the closest relative of the previous king, but was ineligible to inherit the French throne according to an old law."
translation: 「腓力六世是第一位来自瓦卢瓦王朝的法国国王。他以在统治期间挑起百年战争而闻名于世。英格兰的爱德华三世是前国王最近的亲戚，但根据旧法律，他没有资格继承法国王位。」

original: King Desiderius of Lombardy \nDynasty: Alachisling \nDate: 769 AD
translation: 伦巴第 国王 德西德里乌斯\n家族：阿拉希斯\n日期：公元 769 年

original: "Desiderius was a king of the Lombard Kingdom of northern Italy during the Charlemagne era. He was attempting to extend the Lombard power in Italy but came into collision with the papacy. Desiderius married off his daughter, Desiderata, to Charlemagne who would later conquer his realm."
translation: 「德西德里乌斯是查理曼时代意大利北部伦巴第王国的国王。他试图在意大利扩张伦巴第人的势力，却因此与教廷产生了冲突。德西德里乌斯将他的女儿德西德拉塔嫁给了后来征服他王国的查理曼」

original: Basileus Konstantinos of the Byzantine Empire \nDynasty: Isauros \nDate: 769 AD
translation: 拜占庭帝国 巴西琉斯 君士坦丁\n家族：伊苏里亚\n日期：公元 769 年

original: King Haraldr Wartooth \nDynasty: Sköldung \nDate: 769 AD
translation: 国王 哈拉尔德「战牙」\n家族：斯克尔东\n日期：公元 769 年

original: "Haraldr Wartooth was a legendary king of Denmark who succeeded his father as king of Sjælland and expanded his realm. He is said to have met his death at the semi-legendary Battle of Bråvalla. His name, ‘Wartooth’ may have been a comment on his teeth or derived from ‘war hero’."
translation: 「『战牙』哈拉尔德是一位传说中的丹麦国王，他继承了他父亲西兰国王的地位并扩张了他的王国。据说他在半传奇的布珞瓦拉之役中最终战死。他的名字『战牙』，可能是对他牙齿的评论，也可能源于『战争英雄』」

original: King Dawit II of Axum \nDynasty: Gideon \nDate: 1066 AD
translation: 阿克苏姆 国王 大卫二世\n家族：基甸\n日期：公元 1066 年

original: "The Kingdom of Axum was a trading empire located in northern Ethiopia. It was a significant trade post on the commercial route between the Roman Empire and Ancient India. It’s also claimed to be the resting place of the Ark of the Covenant and the purported home of the Queen of Sheba."
translation: 「阿克苏姆王国是位于埃塞俄比亚北部的一个贸易帝国。它是罗马和古印度之间商路上的重要商栈。有传说称阿克苏姆是圣约柜的庇护所和示巴女王的故居。」

original: §YParadox Account§!
translation: §YParadox 账号§!

original: "Konstantinos V, also called the dung-named by his enemies, was a Byzantine emperor infamous for his fervent stance against God being depicted in art or as an icon. He was successful in defending against the onslaught of Muslim conquests, but suffered setbacks in Europe against the Bulgars."
translation: 「拜占庭皇帝君士坦丁五世，也被政敌称为粪名者，因为他狂热反对在圣像以及艺术中表现神而臭名昭著。他成功抵御住穆斯林征服行动的猛攻，但却在欧洲对抗保加尔人时遭受挫折。」

translation: §Y$DLC_NAME$§!包含独占的§Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§!文化单位模型。意味着你可以在地图上轻松地分辨出你的特殊文化军队。\n

original: The §Y$DLC_NAME$§! will make the characters of §Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§! culture appear unique in your game, with a wide arrange of face combinations for both male and female characters.\n
translation: §Y$DLC_NAME$§!将使你游戏中的§Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§!文化角色显得独一无二，男女角色都有大量的面部组合。\n

original: The song tracks in §YSongs of India§! play in the background for characters who are part of the subcontinent of India. Listen to these songs as you play in this vibrant area of the map!\n
translation: §Y「印度之歌」§!里的音乐是为印度次大陆角色准备的背景音乐。当你在地图中这个充满生机的地区游玩时将听到这些音乐！\n

original: The §Y$DLC_NAME$§! contains exclusive unit models for the §Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§! culture. Now meaning that you can easily distinguish your culture unique armies on the map.\n
translation: §Y$DLC_NAME$§!包含独占的§Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§!文化单位模型。意味着你可以在地图上轻松地分辨出你的特殊文化军队。\n

original: The §Y$DLC_NAME$§! will make the characters of §Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§! culture appear unique in your game, with a wide arrange of face combinations for both male and female characters.\n
translation: §Y$DLC_NAME$§!将使你游戏中的§Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§!文化角色显得独一无二，男女角色都有大量的面部组合。\n

original: The §Y$DLC_NAME$§! will make both male and female characters of early §Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§! culture wear more historically appropriate clothes for the era between the 8th to 10th century.\n
translation: §Y$DLC_NAME$§!将使§Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§!文化的早期男性和女性角色衣着更符合八世纪到十世纪的历史。\n

original: The §Y$DLC_NAME$§! will make both male and female characters of early §Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§! culture wear more historically appropriate clothes for the era between the 8th to 10th century.\n
translation: §Y$DLC_NAME$§!将使§Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§!文化的早期男性和女性角色衣着更符合八世纪到十世纪的历史。\n

original: The §YCharlemagne Dynasty Shields§! adds 50 Coat of Arms for famous and prestigious families who reigned during the historical time of Charlemagne.\n
translation: §Y「查理曼」家族盾徽包§!增加了在查理曼时代统治的50个有威望家族的盾徽。\n

original: The §Y$DLC_NAME$§! contains exclusive unit models for the §Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§! culture. Now meaning that you can easily distinguish your culture unique armies on the map.\n
translation: §Y$DLC_NAME$§!包含独占的§Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§!文化单位模型。意味着你可以在地图上轻松地分辨出你的特殊文化军队。\n

original: The §Y$DLC_NAME$§! will make the characters of §Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§! culture appear unique in your game, with a wide arrange of face combinations for both male and female characters.\n
translation: §Y$DLC_NAME$§!将使你游戏中的§Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§!文化角色显得独一无二，男女角色都有大量的面部组合。\n

original: The §Y$DLC_NAME$§! contains exclusive unit models for the Christian holy orders. Watch as these warriors of the faith march as unique-looking armies on the map.\n
translation: §Y$DLC_NAME$§!包含了基督教骑士团的专有单位模型。看着这些信仰的战士作为具有独特外观的军队在地图上行进吧。\n

original: The §YConclave Content Pack§! contains a portrait pack for characters of the Finno-Ugric cultures. Additionally, the pack comes with many exclusive advisor models for the Western Christian cultures, and Steppe Cultures.\n
translation: §Y「御前会议」内容包§!包含芬兰－乌戈尔文化人物的肖像包。除此之外，此包包含大量独占的西方基督教文化和草原文化的顾问模型。\n

original: The §YConclave Content Pack§! contains unique boat models for naval units of §YIndian§! and §YArabic§! cultures. Additionally, the pack comes with many exclusive advisor models for the Western Christian cultures, and Steppe Cultures.\n
translation: §Y「御前会议」内容包§!包含§Y印度§!和§Y阿拉伯§!文化航海部队的特殊船只模型。除此之外，此包包含大量独占的西方基督教文化和草原文化的顾问模型。\n

original: The §YConclave Content Pack§! contains exclusive female advisor models for the Christian §Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§! culture. The pack also includes additional content, such as more advisor models for other cultures.\n
translation: §Y「御前会议」内容包§!包含独占的基督教§Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§!文化女性顾问模型。此包同时包含额外的内容，例如其他文化顾问的模型。\n

original: The §YConclave Content Pack§! contains exclusive female advisor models for the Christian §Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§! culture. The pack also includes additional content, such as more advisor models for other cultures.\n
translation: §Y「御前会议」内容包§!包含独占的基督教§Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§!文化女性顾问模型。此包同时包含额外的内容，例如其他文化顾问的模型。\n

original: The §YConclave Content Pack§! contains exclusive female advisor models for the Christian §Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§! culture. The pack also includes additional content, such as more advisor models for other cultures.\n
translation: §Y「御前会议」内容包§!包含独占的基督教§Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§!文化女性顾问模型。此包同时包含额外的内容，例如其他文化顾问的模型。\n

original: The §YConclave Content Pack§! contains exclusive advisor models for the §Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§! culture, for both female and male characters. The pack also includes additional content, such as more advisor models for other cultures.\n
translation: §Y「御前会议」内容包§!包含独占的§Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§!文化男性和女性顾问模型。此包同时包含额外的内容，例如其他文化顾问的模型。\n

original: The §YConclave Content Pack§! contains exclusive advisor models for the §Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§! culture, for both female and male characters. The pack also includes additional content, such as more advisor models for other cultures.\n
translation: §Y「御前会议」内容包§!包含独占的§Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§!文化男性和女性顾问模型。此包同时包含额外的内容，例如其他文化顾问的模型。\n

original: This is a free DLC. The §Y$DLC_NAME$§! will make the characters of §Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§! culture appear unique in your game, with a wide arrange of face combinations for both male and female characters.\n
translation: 这是一个免费的 DLC。 §Y$DLC_NAME$§!将使您的游戏中的§Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§!文化角色显得独一无二，并为男性和女性角色提供多种面部组合。\n

original: §YThe Reaper's Due Content Pack§! contains a portrait pack which allows for many face combinations for characters coming from the cultures of East Africa. The pack also includes new models for the councilors of African descent, as well as more content for other cultures.\n
translation: §Y「死神索命」内容包§!包含一个有许多东非文化人物脸部组合的肖像包。此包同时包含非洲血统内阁成员的新模型，以及其他文化的更多内容。\n

original: §YThe Reaper's Due Content Pack§! contains a clothing pack so now your Byzantine characters can dress themselves in more historically accurate clothing. The pack also includes content for other cultures.\n
translation: §Y「死神索命」内容包§!包含服饰包，所以现在拜占庭角色的衣着能够更加符合历史。此包同时包含其他文化的内容。\n

original: §YThe Reaper's Due Content Pack§! contains unique models for your female councilors coming from the Eastern Slavic cultures. The pack also includes content for other cultures.\n
translation: §Y「死神索命」内容包§!包含东方斯拉夫文化女性内阁成员的特殊模型。此包同时包含其他文化的内容。\n

original: §YThe Reaper's Due Content Pack§! contains unique councilor models for both female and male councilors coming from the African cultures. The pack also includes content for other cultures.\n
translation: §Y「死神索命」内容包§!包含非洲文化男性和女性内阁成员的特殊模型。此包同时包含其他文化的内容。\n

original: The song tracks in §YHymns of Revelation§! play in the background for religious characters who are part of a monastic order. Listen to these hymns as you amass wealth!\n
translation: §Y「启示录颂歌」§!里的音乐为虔诚角色身为修道会成员时作为背景播放。当你积累财富时听这些圣歌！\n

original: The song tracks in §YHymns of Revelation§! play in the background for religious characters who are part of a monastic order. Listen to these hymns as you amass wealth!\n
translation: §Y「启示录颂歌」§!里的音乐为虔诚角色身为修道会成员时作为背景播放。当你积累财富时听这些圣歌！\n

original: §YThe Sword of Islam§! adds playable Muslim rulers to the game, and with them comes new unique gameplay to the Islamic religions.\n
translation: §Y「伊斯兰之剑」§!使得穆斯林统治者可供扮演，同时为伊斯兰宗教带来独特的游戏体验。\n

original: The §YLegacy of Rome§! expansion allows Orthodox rulers to mend the great schism, reuniting the Western and Eastern halves of the church.\n
translation: §Y「罗马遗产」§!扩展包允许东正教统治者修补东西教会大分裂，重新统一教会的两部分。\n

original: The §YLegacy of Rome§! expansion focuses on the rich political world of Byzantine Empire. Will you restore the old Roman lands and glory?\n
translation: §Y「罗马遗产」§!扩展包专注于拜占庭帝国内部丰富的政治斗争。你会恢复古老的罗马土地和荣耀吗？\n

original: Retinues are regiments of troops that unlike levies don’t need to be dismissed before declaring war. The §Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§! culture has a unique type of retinue, [Root.GetCultureArmyNamePlural].\n
translation: 近卫军不同于征召兵，是不需要在开战前解散的军团。§Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§!文化拥有特殊的近卫军类型[Root.GetCultureArmyNamePlural]。\n

original: Retinues are regiments of troops that unlike levies don’t need to be dismissed before declaring war. The §Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§! culture has a unique type of retinue.\n
translation: 近卫军不同于征召兵，是不需要在开战前解散的军团。§Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§!文化拥有特殊的近卫军类型。\n

original: With the ahistorical invasion from west, §YSunset Invasion§! makes it possible to play as the Mesoamericans.\n
translation: 伴随着来自西方的非史实入侵，§Y「日落入侵」§!让扮演中美洲角色变为可能。\n

original: We’re recommending this expansion as you’ve selected a Republican character.
translation: 我们推荐了这个扩展包，因为你选择了一个共和国角色。

original: We’re recommending this expansion as you’ve selected a non-nomadic pagan character.
translation: 我们推荐了这个扩展包，因为你选择了一个非游牧的原始宗教角色。

original: §YThe Republic§! expansion makes patrician families available for play, so now you can become the doge of a merchant republic.\n
translation: §Y「共和国」§!扩展包使得贵人家族能够扮演，现在你可以成为商业共和国的总督了。\n

original: With time, the non-nomadic pagans can choose reform to a Merchant Republic. §YThe Republic§! expansion is required then to continue to play.\n
translation: 随着时间的推移，非游牧的原始宗教徒可以选择改革成为一个商业共和国。在这之后需要§Y「共和国」§!扩展包才可以继续扮演。\n

original: §YThe Old Gods§! expansion lets you play as a Pagan or Zoroastrian ruler. Survive by ravaging your neighbors!\n
translation: §Y「逝往神灵」§!扩展包让你能扮演原始宗教和祆教统治者，以劫掠你的邻居为生！\n

original: With the focus on the three Abrahamic religions, §YSons of Abraham§! lets you play as a Jewish ruler. Will you to recreate the Kingdom of Israel and rebuild the Third Temple in Jerusalem?\n
translation: §Y「亚伯拉罕之裔」§!聚焦于亚伯拉罕诸教，并让你能够扮演犹太教统治者。你能够恢复以色列王国的荣光，并在耶路撒冷重建第三圣殿吗？\n

original: With the focus on the three Abrahamic religions, §YSons of Abraham§! adds plenty of events, unique holy orders, and more content to enhance these faiths.\n
translation: §Y「亚伯拉罕之裔」§!聚焦于三大亚伯拉罕宗教，增加了大量事件、专属骑士团和更多的内容来强化这些信仰。\n

original: With §YSons of Abraham§! comes a major overhaul of Holy Orders, as well as the addition of religion unique Holy Orders. The §Y[Root.Religion.GetName]§! gains [Root.GetHolyOrderName].\n
translation: §Y「亚伯拉罕之裔」§!对骑士团进行了全面的修订，包括各宗教独有的骑士团。§Y[Root.Religion.GetName]§!获得[Root.GetHolyOrderName]。\n

original: §YRajas of India§! expansion introduces new three dharmic religions for the Indian subcontinent. Try to unite India as the legendary Samrat Chakravartin!\n
translation: §Y「印度罗阇」§!扩展包为印度次大陆引进了三种全新的达摩宗教。试着统一印度并成为传奇的转轮圣王吧！\n

original: §YRajas of India§! is recommended as it allows you to play as Dharmic Religions, such as Buddhists and Hindus.\n
translation: §Y「印度罗阇」§!备受推荐，因为它允许你扮演达摩宗教角色，包括佛教徒和印度教徒。\n

original: In §YCharlemagne§!, Emperors get the ability to appoint viceroys, who gain lifetime governorship with the title returning to the liege on death.\n
translation: 在§Y「查理曼」§!中，皇帝得到了任命总督的能力，总督获得了终身执政的权利并在死后将头衔归还领主。\n

original: §YWay of Life§! adds a layer of character focus to Crusader Kings 2, where every character can select a Focus which grants them a bonus as well as specific content to their chosen lifestyle.\n
translation: §Y「生活之道」§!为游戏添加了一层人物生活重心功能，每一个人物都可以选择一个生活重心，这给予他们额外的奖励并为他们的生活方式选择具体内容。\n

original: In §YHorse Lords§!, you can now play as nomadic government.\n
translation: 在§Y「马上诸王」§!中，你可以扮演游牧制统治者了。\n

original: §YConclave§! increases the challenge of the game by giving your councilors extra motivation to seize some of your power.\n
translation: §Y「御前会议」§!通过给你的内阁成员们更多夺取你权力的动机来增加游戏的挑战性。\n

original: With §YThe Reaper's Due§! expansion the deadly diseases of medieval times sweep across the world to claim many lives.\n
translation: 在§Y「死神索命」§!中，中世纪的致命疾病席卷全世界，夺去许多人的生命。\n

original: In §YMonks and Mystics§!, you'll get to join a religious Society which grants you unique bonuses. You can choose between joining a Monastic Order, Hermetic Society, or even Demon Worship.\n
translation: 在§Y「修道士与密契者」§!中，你将可以加入一个秘密的宗教社团，这会给予你独特的奖励，你可以选择加入修会，赫耳墨斯学会，甚至是选择恶魔崇拜。\n

original: In §YMonks and Mystics§!, you'll get to join a religious Society which grants you unique bonuses, like a Monastic Order where you dedicate your time for good deeds.\n
translation: 在§Y「修道士与密契者」§!中，你将可以加入一个秘密的宗教社团，这会给予你独特的奖励，例如修会将能使你全身心地投入到善行中。\n

original: In §YMonks and Mystics§!, you'll get to join a religious Society which grants you unique bonuses, like the Hermetic Society where you dedicate your time for research.\n
translation: 在§Y「修道士与密契者」§!中，你将可以加入一个秘密的宗教社团，这会给予你独特的奖励，例如赫耳墨斯学会将能使你全身心地投入到研究中。\n

original: In §YMonks and Mystics§!, you’ll get to join a religious Society which grants you unique bonuses. You can choose between joining the Hermetics in their studies, or even partake in Demon Worship.\n
translation: 在§Y「修道士与密契者」§!中，你将可以加入一个秘密的宗教社团，这会给予你独特的奖励，你可以选择加入赫耳墨斯学会的研究之中，甚至是选择恶魔崇拜。\n

original: In §YMonks and Mystics§!, you'll get to join a religious Society which grants you unique bonuses. You can choose between joining a Monastic Order, or even Demon Worship.\n
translation: 在§Y「修道士与密契者」§!中，你将可以加入一个秘密的宗教社团，这会给予你独特的奖励，你可以选择加入修会，甚至是选择恶魔崇拜。\n

original: In §YMonks and Mystics§!, you'll get to join a religious Society which grants you unique bonuses. You can choose between joining the Shia Hashashin, Hermetic Society, or even Demon Worship.\n
translation: 在§Y「修道士与密契者」§!中，你将可以加入一个秘密的宗教社团，这会给予你独特的奖励，你可以选择加入什叶派阿萨辛，赫耳墨斯学会，甚至是选择恶魔崇拜。\n

original: In §YMonks and Mystics§!, you'll get to join a secret religious Society which grants you unique bonuses, like worshipping a Demon grants you healing powers and the ability to curse your enemies.\n
translation: 在§Y「修道士与密契者」§!中，你将可以加入一个秘密的宗教社团，这会给予你独特的奖励，例如崇拜恶魔会赐予你治愈的力量和诅咒你敌人的能力。\n

original: In addition to the societies that you get in §YMonks and Mystics§!, you also get new portraits and new graphics for your units appropriate for the §Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§! culture.\n
translation: 除了在§Y「修道士与密契者」§!中获得的社团外，你也将获得符合§Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§!文化的新肖像与新单位模型。\n

original: With §YJade Dragon§!, China is introduced with its own game rules, and you also get new portraits for your characters appropriate for the §Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§! culture.\n
translation: 伴随§Y「碧玉之龙」§!，中国带着其自身游戏规则被引入进来，同时你得到了§Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§!文化人物的正确头像。\n

original: With the focus on the East, §YJade Dragon§! introduces China with its own game rules, and additional religions in the region can be accessed by either §YJade Dragon§! or other DLCs.\n
translation: 随着对东方的关注，§Y「碧玉之龙」§!引入了有其自身游戏规则的中国，同时无论§Y「碧玉之龙」§!或其他扩展包都能够接触该地域的其他宗教。\n

original:
Description: 
Christ may rule in Rome and Constantinople, but Northern Europe is still home to the old gods of war and the hearth. These faiths will collide in fierce combat as the Prince of Peace brings conversion by the sword, and Gods of Nature demand unnatural sacrifices as the price of their favor. 

§YHoly Fury§! focuses on enhancing the experience of playing as a Pagan or a Catholic character. Lean on your war lodge for support in your conquests, or bow before the Pope to claim your divine throne. Play as a historical bloodline, giving a bonus to all members of that dynasty, or establish your own legendary bloodline that will echo through the ages. 

You can also start your game on a fictional map of Europe as a small realm fighting for space, or on a random map with historical analogs for the great kingdoms of yore.
translation:
描述：
基督可能会主宰罗马和君士坦丁堡，但北欧依然是旧日战神的家园。当「和平之君」用剑劈开皈依的道路时，这些信仰会与之发生激烈的争斗，自然之神会寻求非自然的献祭作为神恩的代价。

§Y「神圣之怒」§! 重点增强了扮演原始宗教或天主教角色的游玩体验。依靠战士公会来助力你的东征西讨，亦或是向教宗低头来宣称你的神授权位。扮演一位有史可依的血脉后裔，为整个家族的成员带来加成，或者构建自己回响千古的传奇血脉。

你也可以作为一个为生存而战的小国在虚构的欧洲地图上开局游戏，或者在一个模拟旧日历史上伟大王国的随机地图上开局。

original:
High Chief Arisato of Kanem 
Dynasty: Duguwa 
Date: 867 AD
translation:
加涅姆大酋长 阿里特索
家族：杜古瓦
日期：公元 867 年

original: "The Kanem Empire at its height covered most of modern Chad and northeastern Nigeria. The origin of this African empire is unclear, but under the leadership of the Duguwa dynasty, the Kanembu people eventually dominated the other cultures and became the line of kings (Mai) of the Empire."
translation: 「加涅姆帝国在鼎盛时涵盖现代乍得的大部分和尼日利亚东北部。这个非洲帝国的来源虽然不明，但在杜古瓦王朝的统治下，加涅姆布人最终胜过了其他文明，成为了帝国的国王（玛伊）世系。」

original:
Guy de Lusignan 
Dynasty: de Lusignan 
Date: 1187 AD
translation:
居伊 德 吕西尼昂
家族：德 吕西尼昂
日期：公元 1187 年

original: "Guy de Lusignan became king of Jerusalem in 1186 succeeding his step-son Baldwin V. Jerusalem fell into the hands of the Ayyubids shortly after Guy's capture in Battle of Hattin. After his release a year later, he besieged Acre, an act which rallied the Kings of Europe to begin the Third Crusade."
translation: 「居伊·德·吕西尼昂于 1186 年继承了他的继子鲍德温五世的耶路撒冷王位。居伊在哈丁战役中被俘后不久，耶路撒冷便落入阿尤布王朝之手。居伊在被释放的一年后围攻阿克城，召集来了欧洲的君王，发动了第三次十字军东征。」

original:
El Cid 
Dynasty: de Vivar 
Date: 1094 AD
translation:
熙德
家族：德 比瓦尔
日期：公元 1094 年

original: "Rodrigo Díaz de Vivar, known as the folk-hero El Cid, was a Castilian military leader in medieval Spain. His famous military campaigns helped expand Castilian territory, and even after his exile, he returned to the Christian service fighting for his former Lord. He ordered a siege on Valencia and in 1094 the city fell into his hands."
translation: 「罗德里戈·迪亚斯·德比瓦尔，被称为民间英雄熙德，是中世纪西班牙的卡斯蒂利亚军事领袖。他著名的军事行动帮助扩大了卡斯蒂利亚的领土，甚至在他流亡之后，他再度返回基督教阵营中为他的前任君主而战。他下令围攻瓦伦西亚，1094 年城市落入他的手中。」

original:
Khagan Baghatur 
Dynasty: Ashina 
Date: 769 AD
translation:
可汗 巴哈图尔
家族：阿史那
日期：公元 769 年

original: "Khagan Baghatur of the Khazars descended from the Ashina tribe, the ruling dynasty of the ancient Göktürk empires. The Khazars was the most powerful nation to emerge from its predecessor, the Western Turkic Khaganate, until it too fell around 850. Baghatur is a Turco-Mongol honorific title for hero."
translation: 「可萨汗国的可汗巴哈图尔出身统治古代蓝突厥帝国的阿史那部族。从它的前身西突厥汗国分裂出的可萨汗国是最当时强大的国家，直到约 850 年开始衰落。巴哈图尔在突厥－蒙古文化中是对英雄的尊称。」

original: §YHoly Fury§! expansion lets you play as a Pagan ruler. Protect the old ways against those seeking to convert you!
translation: §Y「神圣之怒」§!扩展包让你扮演原始宗教的统治者。守卫旧神信仰对抗那些试图改变你信仰的人！

original: The §YHoly Fury§! expansion enriches the experience of Catholics, with new events focusing on crusades, coronations, and sainthood.
translation: §Y「神圣之怒」§!丰富了天主教角色的体验，其中包括了关于十字军、加冕礼和圣人的各种全新事件。

original: With §YHoly Fury§!, Legendary Bloodlines are introduced, based on the historical deeds of famous people.
translation: §Y「神圣之怒」§!中根据著名角色的历史事迹加入了许多传奇血脉。

original: This Expansion is recommended as you've selected a character with a historical Legendary Bloodline.
translation: 这个扩展包备受推荐，因为你选择了一名具有传奇血脉的角色。

original: In addition to the warrior lodges and crusade enhancements that you get in §YHoly Fury§!, you also get new portraits and new graphics for your units appropriate for the §Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§! culture.\n
translation: 在§Y「神圣之怒」§!中，除了战士公会和十字军的增强，你也获得相应的新的肖像和新的兵模，适合于§Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§!文化。\n

original: In addition to the warrior lodges and crusade enhancements that you get in §YHoly Fury§!, you also get new portraits appropriate for the §Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§! culture.\n
translation: 在§Y「神圣之怒」§!中，除了战士公会和十字军的增强，你也获得相应的新的肖像，适合于§Y[Root.Culture.GetName]§!文化。\n

original: "Al-Mustansir Billah, the eighth caliph of the Fatimid Caliphate, ruled for 60 years, making him the longest reigning Muslim ruler. Despite the length of his rule, he had limited power restricted to only one region. Al-Mustansir Billah succeeded his father when he was only eight months."\n
translation: 穆斯坦绥尔 比拉，法蒂玛王朝第八位哈里发，在位长达60年，这使他成为统治时间最长的穆斯林统治者。与他长期统治相对的则是他在京畿地区的受限权力。穆斯坦绥尔 比拉被宣布继位时年仅八个月。\n

Despite the length of his rule, he had limited power restricted to only one region. Al-Mustansir Billah succeeded his father when he was only eight months."\n
